description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'Home' that renders a page with a logo, loader, text, and a button. It includes component composition, templates with bound properties, state management, lifecycle hooks, and methods for animations and interactions.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A LightningJS component that creates an interactive page with animated elements, a logo, loader, and button.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Rotates the loader's color array periodically based on the specified interval.
